p: Aerial parts of Astragalus campylotrichus Bunge (GN0555047), A. macronyx Bunge (GN0555205), A. mucidus Bunge (GN0555131), and A. sieversianus Pall. (GN0555089) were collected from the Tashkent region (Uzbekistan, in July 2015). A. chiwensis Bunge (N20160375) and A. lehmannianus Bunge (N20160328) were collected from the Karakalpak and Bukhara regions (Uzbekistan, in June 2016). The plants were identified by Dr. Orzimat Turginov at the Laboratory of Flora of Uzbekistan, and the voucher samples have been deposited at the Herbarium of the Botany Institute, Academy of Sciences of Uzbekistan.
